Missing Bindings for SQLite3

January 15, 2017

This particular problem is related to installing SQLite3 for Node.

To begin, run the command npm install sqlite3. If it doesn’t work, run the command npm install sqlite3 --build-from-source instead.

If both commands don’t work after starting the node application and an error similiar to /node_modules/sqlite3/lib/binding/node-v43-darwin-x64/node_sqlite3.node comes up, we need to install SQLite3 but switching node versions.

Using NVM, install any major versions nvm install v5.6, switch to the version nvm use v5.6 and run npm install sqlite3 or npm install sqlite3 --build-from-source.

Attempt to start the Node application node index. If a similiar error occurs again, switch to another version and repeat the process.

Once its working, switch Node back to the desired version.

Contact Dark/Light
